last_episode_to_air.name: Today is not just tomorrow's yesterday.
last_episode_to_air.overview: A powered up Tiger starts attacking Barnaby, who's left drained of power and vulnerable. Later, Tiger faces a sudden change.

name: TIGER & BUNNY
overview: In an alternate New York City protected by a band of superheroes called NEXT, veteran Wild Tiger is forced to team up with rookie Barnaby Brooks Jr.

seasons.name: TIGER & BUNNY
seasons.overview: Tiger tries to rebuild his image with Bunny at his side as the pair saves Stern Bild from animated statues, a pyromaniac and the psychotic Mad Bear.

seasons.name: TIGER & BUNNY 2
seasons.overview: Mismatched hero duo Wild Tiger and Barnaby lead the way in keeping the peace and getting sponsors as heroes from around the world enter the fray.

episodes.name: All's Well That Ends Well
episodes.overview: Aging superhero Kotetsu, known as Wild Tiger, worries that he may lose his job on the show "Hero TV" when his sponsor company changes hands.

episodes.name: A Good Beginning Makes a Good Ending.
episodes.overview: Kotetsu and Barnaby are paired up, but their differing methods prevent them from working as a team, leading to danger for Kotetsu's daughter.

episodes.name: Many a True Word is Spoken in Jest
episodes.overview: Kotetsu reluctantly participates in a documentary about Barnaby, and they're both forced into action when they learn a bomb has been planted.

episodes.name: Fear is Often Greater Than the Danger
episodes.overview: Ice-wielding superhero Blue Rose decides to leave the world of "Hero TV" to go back to her old life as a teenage girl named Karina who loves to sing.

episodes.name: Go for Broke!
episodes.overview: Kotetsu holds a big surprise birthday party for Barnaby with the other heroes; an expensive diamond known as the "Tears of Hercules" is stolen.

episodes.name: Fire is a Good Servant But a Bad Master
episodes.overview: Fire Emblem is suspected of murder after criminals arrested by Barnaby are found burned to death by peculiar blue flames in their prison cell.

episodes.name: The Wolf Knows What the Foul Beast Thinks
episodes.overview: Kotetsu criticizes Barnaby for allowing a NEXT to kill the culprit they were chasing; Barnaby reveals his search for the clue to his parents' killer.

episodes.name: There is Always a Next Time
episodes.overview: Stern Bild doesn't have capital punishment, but Lunatic's act of killing criminals begins to win support of the people, who praise him as an antihero.

episodes.name: Spare the Rod and Spoil the Child
episodes.overview: Kotetsu is assigned to baby-sit an infant, who takes a liking to a tomboy named Dragon Kid. The next day, Dragon Kid and the baby go missing.

episodes.name: The Calm Before the Storm
episodes.overview: Barnaby has finally tracked down the whereabouts of his parents' killer; Kotetsu runs into trouble on the way to visiting his daughter.

episodes.name: The Die is Cast
episodes.overview: Ouroboros demands the release of the man Barnaby was investigating, and then starts attacking the structural columns supporting Stern Bild.

episodes.name: Take Heed of the Snake in the Grass
episodes.overview: Jake challenges each of the heroes to fights, stating that he will surrender if he loses but will destroy a column supporting the city if he wins.

episodes.name: Confidence is a Plant of Slow Growth
episodes.overview: After the other heroes fail to defeat Jake, Barnaby steps forward to protect Stern Bild and its people -- and to get revenge for his parents' death.

episodes.name: Love Is Blind
episodes.overview: Ten months after their epic battle with terrorist Jake Martinez, Tiger and Barnaby are slated to form a special unit with Blue Rose.

episodes.name: The Sky's the Limit ...
episodes.overview: When Sky High falls in love with a woman he meets at a park, he turns to Fire Emblem, Blue Rose and Dragon Kid for advice on how to get close to her.

episodes.name: Truth Lies at the Bottom of the Well
episodes.overview: Kotetsu doesn't like the reason Ben gives him for the recent boosts in his power; Yuri, aka Lunatic, is haunted by a past incident.

episodes.name: Blood is Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: Kotetsu takes a vacation to his hometown, where he confesses his fears to his brother and makes a tough decision to keep his promise to his late wife.

episodes.name: Ignorance is Bliss
episodes.overview: Kotetsu tries to tell Barnaby that he's retiring, but he's interrupted with news that Kriem has come out of her coma.

episodes.name: There's No Way Out
episodes.overview: To help Barnaby, Kotetsu suggests they retrace Barnaby's steps the day of his parents' murder, but it doesn't produce the results they hoped for.

episodes.name: Full of Courtesy, Full of Craft.
episodes.overview: Samantha wants to meet with Kotetsu regarding the new information she found, but he is called away for a sudden assignment.

episodes.name: Heaven Helps Those Who Help Themselves
episodes.overview: Framed for a crime he didn't commit and pursued by the other heroes, Kotetsu is cornered, but a familiar face appears.

episodes.name: Bad Luck Often Brings Good Luck
episodes.overview: Kotetsu puts his plan to clear his name into action. Meanwhile, Barnaby is on his way to join the rest of the heroes.

episodes.name: Misfortunes Never Come Singly
episodes.overview: Kotetsu and Barnaby are finally reunited, but the rest of the heroes are taken hostage by Maverick, who holds them in the Justice Tower.

episodes.name: Nothing Ventured, Nothing Gained.
episodes.overview: Kotetsu and Barnaby take on H-01 despite having to wait for their powers to recharge, while the rest of the heroes must make a tough decision.

episodes.name: Eternal Immortality.
episodes.overview: The heroes suffer a stunning loss and must mourn a fallen peer, while Barnaby finally encounters his parents' killer one-on-one.

1.name: TIGER & BUNNY
1.overview: Tiger tries to rebuild his image with Bunny at his side as the pair saves Stern Bild from animated statues, a pyromaniac and the psychotic Mad Bear.

episodes.name: A word to the wise is enough.
episodes.overview: With exciting new heroes gaining popularity and stardom, Tiger and Barnaby are called upon to set a good example.

episodes.name: No one knows the weight of another's burden.
episodes.overview: Now an official superhero, Subaru is eager to make his mark. Feeling desperate, he starts to get ahead of himself.

episodes.name: Suspicion will raise bogies.
episodes.overview: Karina decides to meet with a lonely and sickly fan who says Blue Rose is their favorite superhero. She asks Tiger to come along too.

episodes.name: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
episodes.overview: As the top-ranking superheroes, Fire Emblem and Sky High seem like the perfect buddy team; nevertheless, Nathan has one particular complaint.

episodes.name: Live and let live.
episodes.overview: After getting into an argument with Ivan, Antonio is worried that the Rock Bison and Origami Cyclone partnership won't survive.

episodes.name: Youth should be regarded with respect.
episodes.overview: Lara and Pao-Lin seem to have perfect teamwork, but then Lara's overbearing mother convinces her to see Pao-Lin not as a partner, but as a rival.

episodes.name: Out of the mouths of babes oft times come gems.
episodes.overview: Tiger is delighted — and a little surprised — when his daughter Kaede comes to the city to visit him with her friend.

episodes.name: You can‘t judge a book by it‘s cover.
episodes.overview: Subaru gets worried when his partner Thomas is reprimanded for being too violent while apprehending a robber.

episodes.name: Have not thy cloak to make when it begins to rain.
episodes.overview: Tiger bends the rules to try to catch a violent NEXT named Vincent Carl, who left Barnaby badly injured while evading capture.

episodes.name: Pride comes before a fall.
episodes.overview: Fire Emblem and Sky High are found frozen, victims of an attack by a pair of NEXT suspects who've declared war on the city's superheroes.

episodes.name: Every cloud has a silver lining.
episodes.overview: Agnes orders the superheroes to stand down and avoid confrontation with Hugan and Mugan, but soon they're faced with a double threat.

episodes.name: Man’s extremity is God’s opportunity.
episodes.overview: The remaining superheroes learn Hugan and Mugan's motives, and then put together a plan to defeat the powerful duo.

episodes.name: Constant dropping wears away a stone.
episodes.overview: The superheroes are fighting as hard as they can, but Hugan and Mugan seem impossible to defeat.

episodes.name: March winds and April showers bring forth May flowers.
episodes.overview: Fire Emblem and Sky High win the King of the Buddy Heroes title. Barnaby gets some exciting news, but he has to keep it a secret.

episodes.name: No pain no gain.
episodes.overview: Little is yet known about the NEXT incident, but multiple theories abound. Everyone wants to know what's going on between Kotetsu and Karina.

episodes.name: A friend in need is a friend indeed.
episodes.overview: During a promo shoot, He Is Thomas declares his admiration for L.L. Audun. Then, the heroes are mobilized in response to an attack.

episodes.name: The gods send nuts to those who have no teeth.
episodes.overview: As the "X" phenomenon spreads among NEXT throughout the city, Yuri gathers the heroes and gives them some bad news.

episodes.name: One eyewitness is better than ten hearsays.
episodes.overview: The public has started to turn against all NEXT. Ryan thinks that a NEXT named Gregory Sunshine might be connected to the "X" phenomenon.

episodes.name: You cannot make a crab walk straight.
episodes.overview: Mattia wakes up in the hospital, but he claims to not remember anything that happened. There may be a NEXT with the ability to control other people.

episodes.name: The darkest hour is just before the dawn.
episodes.overview: The Apollon heroes are all told to sign new contracts putting excessive restrictions on what they can do. Yuri shares a story about his father.

episodes.name: Nothing comes of nothing.
episodes.overview: Before the heroes' evacuation, Agnes asks them to gather for one last farewell taping. But she might have something up her sleeve.

episodes.name: Coming events cast their shadows before.
episodes.overview: Gregory powers up the inmates of Abbas Prison and they start rampaging throughout the city. The heroes go rogue to stop them, despite the consequences.

episodes.name: Lookers-on see most of the game.
episodes.overview: Gregory Sunshine has one last inmate to meet; a criminal with incredible powers. Meanwhile, the heroes struggle to neutralize the escaped NEXT.

episodes.name: Union is strength.
episodes.overview: Sigourney Rosicky reveals the reason for her vendetta against Little Aurora. The heroes get an unlikely ally in their fight against L. L. Audun.

episodes.name: Today is not just tomorrow's yesterday.
episodes.overview: A powered up Tiger starts attacking Barnaby, who's left drained of power and vulnerable. Later, Tiger faces a sudden change.

2.name: TIGER & BUNNY 2
2.overview: Mismatched hero duo Wild Tiger and Barnaby lead the way in keeping the peace and getting sponsors as heroes from around the world enter the fray.
